UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Genome- and metabolome-guided discovery of marine BamA inhibitors revealed a dedicated darobactin halogenase
Literature.Author: Böhringer N, Kramer JC, de la Mora E, Padva L, Wuisan ZG, Liu Y, Kurz M, Marner M, Nguyen H, Amara P, Yokoyama K, Nicolet Y, Mettal U, Schäberle TF

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=4-8µg/ml),Escherichia coli NRZ 14408(MIC=1µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=4-16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=8µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae DSM 30104(MIC=2-4µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=16µg/ml),Salmonella enterica subsp. enterica serovar Enteritidis ATCC 13076(MIC=4-8µg/ml)
